thread.title: BRIEF-Michaels Companies Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.11

title: BRIEF-Michaels Companies Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.11
text: March 22, 2018 / 11:18 AM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Michaels Companies Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.11 Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Michaels Companies Inc: * THE MICHAELS COMPANIES REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS * Q4 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 2.5 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.19 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q1 2018 SALES $1.139 BILLION TO $1.15 BILLION * Q4 SALES $1.891 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.88 BILLION * SEES 2018 COMPARABLE STORE SALES TO INCREASE BETWEEN 0% AND 1.5% * SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES WILL BE BETWEEN $160 MILLION AND $170 MILLION * SEES Q1 COMPARABLE STORE SALES TO INCREASE 0% TO 1.0% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
